name: Venison Stroganoff
author: Cathy
summary: This is an easy and very good recipe that my family loves, cooked with venison.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Season venison with salt, pepper and garlic powder to taste
Saute onion in a large skillet; when soft, add venison and brown
Drain when venison is no longer pink and add soup
Reduce heat to low and simmer
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain
When noodles are almost done cooking, stir sour cream into meat mixture
Pour meat mixture over hot cooked noodles and serve
